belongs_to_collection.name: Honto Ni Atta! Noroi no Video Collection

original_title: ほんとにあった！呪いのビデオ７
overview: A collection of psychic images received by general posts. Fear multiplies! Earth-bound spirits, vengeful spirits, floating spirits, guardian spirits ... full of mysterious images that can not be elucidated by science!
tagline: It's really scary! Can you face the truth projected by the camera?
title: Honto ni Atta! Noroi no Video 7
